tutorial: How to Set up a New Chart

definition.text: You got this. Creating references is a piece of cake. Let's make the connection!

paragraphs.text: Out of the three Data Mine Products nodes available, we are going to connect our chart to the Masters Data Mine.
Find the Layer Manager under the Timeline Chart you added earlier. Then establish a reference between it and the Masters Data Mine Products node.
If things are connected correctly, the name of the data mine should appear over the layer manager.
